item.title: Zelensky rejects Trump-led deal to give US access to Ukrainian minerals — ‘it does not protect us’
item.description: Trump, who has been highly critical of the money Washington has sent to Ukraine to fight Russia's invasion, pushed for access to rare earths in Ukrain...

item.title: Trump is rushing toward a deal with Putin, leaving Europe in the dust
item.description: The fear for many officials is that by dialing back support for Ukraine, Trump is inviting Putin to probe NATO’s willingness to defend the alliance.

item.title: Trump tours Boeing plane to highlight aircraft maker’s delay in delivering a new Air Force One
item.description: Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg said last month that Musk is working with the company to help speed delivery of the Air Force One replacements.

item.title: Trump’s trade war could spiral into a debt war that sends interest rates soaring, former White House official warns
item.description: "This makes Treasury markets a ripe target if negotiations result in prolonged conflict."

item.title: Housing markets with a lot of federal workers have been thrown into disarray by Trump’s RTO order and layoff fears
item.description: Some people are holding off on buying new homes as federal job insecurity rises.
